Daniel

item.title: By: Darcy Ward
item.dc:creator: Darcy Ward
item.description:
Hey Ben,
I'm just starting up a business in Ireland and am focusing on Facebook to get started. I'm hoping to have an Alpha within the next month.
Will keep you posted!
Darcy.
item.content:encoded:
Hey Ben,

I’m just starting up a business in Ireland and am focusing on Facebook to get started. I’m hoping to have an Alpha within the next month.

Will keep you posted!

Darcy.

item.title: By: John O'Shea
item.dc:creator: John O'Shea
item.description:
Ben, We (nooked) just completed an app for Big Brother UK (http://ietech.blognation.com/2007/08/15/nooked-powers-big-brother-on-facebook/) - 7,000+ users in less than 3 days, not bad!
-John
item.content:encoded:
Ben,
We (nooked) just completed an app for Big Brother UK (http://ietech.blognation.com/2007/08/15/nooked-powers-big-brother-on-facebook/) – 7,000+ users in less than 3 days, not bad!

-John
